analyzed: bslad pa yin pa de bas na zla ba gnyis pa'i shes pa yod par srid pa de phyir zla ba gnyis la sogs pa'i shes pa de rtog med na yang /
translated: that cognition of a double moon, etc., even though nonconceptual,üîΩis distorted.

original: mngon sum rtog pa dang bral ba can zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid 'di tsam brjod pas tshad ma nyid du 'gyur ba de rab rib bcas zhes ston par byed pa'i tshig gis bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum rtog pa dang bral ba can zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid 'di tsam brjod pas tshad ma nyid du 'gyur ba de rab rib bcas zhes ston par byed pa'i tshig gis bkag pa yin no //
translated: The mere statement of the definition ‚Äúperception is free from conceptuality‚Äù is refuted by the phrase ‚Äúperception with cataracts.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: slu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: slu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is deceptive.

original: der snang ba can gyi don dang don byed pa de'i don du gnyer ba de phrad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der snang ba can gyi don dang don byed pa de'i don du gnyer ba de phrad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The object that appears there and the object that is sought for the sake of the object‚Äôs function do not meet.üîΩAlso, in the Purposeful Commentary, it says:

original: don du'ang / mngon sum ltar snang gnyis su bshad //
analyzed: don du'ang / mngon sum ltar snang gnyis su bshad //
translated: Two types of false perception are explained.

original: gang gi phyir 'di ltar slob dpon ni dbang po las skyes pa yin na yang /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di ltar slob dpon ni dbang po las skyes pa yin na yang /
translated: Because of that, the master says that even though it arises from the sense faculties,

original: bslad pa mngon sum ltar snang ba yin pa de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: bslad pa mngon sum ltar snang ba yin pa de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: it is a false perception that appears as if it were direct perception.üîΩBecause of that, it is said:üîΩDelusion, conventional knowledge,

original: 'khrul dang kun rdzob shes pa dang // rjes dpag rjes su dpag las byung //
analyzed: 'khrul dang kun rdzob shes pa dang // rjes dpag rjes su dpag las byung //
translated: Inference, and what arises from inference,

original: dran 'byung brjod pa las byung zhes //
analyzed: dran 'byung brjod pa las byung zhes //
translated: Arising from memory, and arising from expression.

original: zhes bya bas rtog pa'i bdag nyid can gyi mngon sum ltar snang ba bstan pa yin no zhes bya bas rnam bar bcad nas gnyis ba rtog pa med pa'i mngon sum ltar snang ba rab rib bcas zhes bya bas bshad pa yin no //üîΩ'bras bur gyur pa'i shes pa de nyid kyis yul gyi rnam par skyes pa'i sgo nas rtog pa @216a * //
analyzed: zhes bya bas rtog pa'i bdag nyid can gyi mngon sum ltar snang ba bstan pa yin no zhes bya bas rnam bar bcad nas gnyis ba rtog pa med pa'i mngon sum ltar snang ba rab rib bcas zhes bya bas bshad pa yin no // 'bras bur gyur pa'i shes pa de nyid kyis yul gyi rnam par skyes pa'i sgo nas rtog pa @216a * //
translated: Thus, having eliminated the apparent direct perception that has the nature of conceptualization, the second, the apparent direct perception that is without conceptualization, is explained by ‚Äúwith an eye disease.‚Äù

original: dang bcas pa la brten nas /üîΩtshad ma nyid du nye bar btags pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa /üîΩbya ba dang ni sgrub byed ces //
analyzed: dang bcas pa la brten nas / tshad ma nyid du nye bar btags pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa / bya ba dang ni sgrub byed ces //
translated: The result, the cognition, is designated as valid knowledge in dependence on the conceptual cognition that arises in the aspect of the object.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed do //
translated: This is explained by ‚Äúthe activity and the accomplishment‚Äù and so on.

original: shes pa'i don dang 'dra ba ni tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: shes pa'i don dang 'dra ba ni tshad ma yin la /
translated: That which is similar to the object of cognition is valid knowledge.

original: don nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid ni 'bras bu yin par rigs kyi /
analyzed: don nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid ni 'bras bu yin par rigs kyi /
translated: It is reasonable that the experience of the object is the result.

original: chad ma las don gzhan du 'gyur ba ni 'bras bu ma yin no //
analyzed: chad ma las don gzhan du 'gyur ba ni 'bras bu ma yin no //
translated: It is not reasonable that the result is something other than the valid knowledge.

original: bya ba dang ni sgrub byed ces //
analyzed: bya ba dang ni sgrub byed ces //
translated: ‚ÄúThe activity and the accomplishment‚Äù and so on.

original: las kun gyi ni bya ba thams cad kyi /üîΩthams cad dag / sgrub byed ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: las kun gyi ni bya ba thams cad kyi / thams cad dag / sgrub byed ma yin pa'am /
translated: All actions of all agentsüîΩare not the means of accomplishing all objects.

original: sgrub par byed pa thams cad kyi thams cad bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa thams cad kyi thams cad bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Or, all means of accomplishing all objects are not the actions of all agents,

original: thug pa med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thug pa med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that there would be no end to things.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What then is it?

original: gang las 'bras yin /üîΩgang yin pa'i las de bya ba de ni de'i sgrub byed /
analyzed: gang las 'bras yin / gang yin pa'i las de bya ba de ni de'i sgrub byed /
translated: It is that from which results arise.

original: de sgrub par byed pa las chod pa med par tha snyad la brten pa'i sgo nas rab tu 'grub pa thob par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de sgrub par byed pa las chod pa med par tha snyad la brten pa'i sgo nas rab tu 'grub pa thob par 'gyur gyi /
translated: That action which is the means of accomplishing that object is established as the means of accomplishing it in dependence upon the convention that is based on the absence of any other action in between.

original: bskyed par bya ba skyed par byed pa'i dngos po ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba skyed par byed pa'i dngos po ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that the object to be produced is the means of producing it.

original: de'i bya ba ni de nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i bya ba ni de nyid yin no //
translated: Its action is just that.

original: gzugs la sogs pa las /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa las /
translated: From form and so on,

original: de la nyams myong tsam du ni //
analyzed: de la nyams myong tsam du ni //
translated: the experience of pleasure and so on,

original: shes pa 'dra ba'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: shes pa 'dra ba'i bdag nyid can //
translated: which has the nature of being similar to consciousness,

original: bdag nyid des byed pa'i rang bzhin des /
analyzed: bdag nyid des byed pa'i rang bzhin des /
translated: arises from the nature of that which is the cause of that.

original: 'gyur na gang gis /
analyzed: 'gyur na gang gis /
translated: By what?

original: las so so la ste don so so la rnam 'byed 'gyur /
analyzed: las so so la ste don so so la rnam 'byed 'gyur /
translated: By the individual actions, that is, the individual objects.

original: 'di ni sngon po'i shes pa yin zhing /
analyzed: 'di ni sngon po'i shes pa yin zhing /
translated: This is a consciousness of blue.üîΩ

original: 'di ni ser po'i shes pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyis so //üîΩde lta ma yin na don thams cad shes pa thams cad kyi shes byar 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: 'di ni ser po'i shes pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyis so // de lta ma yin na don thams cad shes pa thams cad kyi shes byar 'gyur ba'am /
translated: It is by means of such conventions as this is a consciousness of blue and this is a consciousness of yellow.üîΩOtherwise, all objects would be objects of all consciousnesses,

original: 'ga' zhig kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig kyang ma yin te /
translated: or else nothing would be an object of any consciousness,

original: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there would be no distinction.

original: dbang po la sogs pa'i mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i tha dad pa ni shes pa'i nges par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba yang legs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa'i mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i tha dad pa ni shes pa'i nges par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba yang legs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not correct to say that the differences of unclearness and so on of the sense faculties and so on are what determine the consciousnesses.

original: 'di ltar dbang po la sogs pa'i rgyu la mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i tha dad yod na yang /
analyzed: 'di ltar dbang po la sogs pa'i rgyu la mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i tha dad yod na yang /
translated: This is because even if there are differences of unclearness and so on in the causes, such as the sense faculties,üîΩthe consciousnesses do not become different in their natures.

original: shes pa 'di'i bdag nyid gyur ma yin sngon po la sogs pa'i las tha dad la tha dad min nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid du 'dra bar gyur pa /
analyzed: shes pa 'di'i bdag nyid gyur ma yin sngon po la sogs pa'i las tha dad la tha dad min nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid du 'dra bar gyur pa /
translated: They are similar in being experienced as having the nature of the object, such as blue, and so on.

original: tha dad pas nges byed ma yin /
analyzed: tha dad pas nges byed ma yin /
translated: Therefore, the differences do not determine the consciousnesses.

original: mi rung ste shes pa thams cad kyi khyad par med pas rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi rung ste shes pa thams cad kyi khyad par med pas rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is not correct, because all consciousnesses would be the cause without distinction.

original: khyad par med na yang gang zhig bdag nyid khyad par du 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni yul rnam par gzhag pa'i rten gzhan la ltos par 'gyur ba de'i bdag nyid de'i mtshon par byed @216b ba por rigs pa yin pa /
analyzed: khyad par med na yang gang zhig bdag nyid khyad par du 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni yul rnam par gzhag pa'i rten gzhan la ltos par 'gyur ba de'i bdag nyid de'i mtshon par byed @216b ba por rigs pa yin pa /
translated: Even if there were no distinction, that which is distinguished in itself would be the basis of the presentation of objects, and it would be reasonable for it to be the nature of that which is distinguished and the indicator of that.

original: de'i phyir bdag tha dad gang las shes pa 'di sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir bdag tha dad gang las shes pa 'di sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa /
translated: Therefore, from what difference of the self does this consciousness, blue, yellow, and so on,

original: 'di yi rtog pa zhes bya 'di //
analyzed: 'di yi rtog pa zhes bya 'di //
translated: and this so-called thoughtüîΩarise?

original: bya ba 'di ni las des yin par 'gyur ba de nyid chod pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bya ba 'di ni las des yin par 'gyur ba de nyid chod pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: This activity would be the object of that, and since that is uninterrupted,

original: 'di rab tu sgrub par byed pas zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar nas /
analyzed: 'di rab tu sgrub par byed pas zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar nas /
translated: it is connected with the words ‚Äúthis is established by that which establishes it.‚Äù

original: de sgrub byed de grub pa yin /
analyzed: de sgrub byed de grub pa yin /
translated: That which establishes it is established.

original: chad pa med pa yang byed pa thams cad tshogs na yang rtog pa 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i nges pa la brten pa nyid kyis yin no zhes bya ba ni 'jug bsdu ba'o /
analyzed: chad pa med pa yang byed pa thams cad tshogs na yang rtog pa 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i nges pa la brten pa nyid kyis yin no zhes bya ba ni 'jug bsdu ba'o /
translated: And it is not interrupted because even when all the causes are assembled, it is based on the ascertainment that this is a conception.üîΩ

original: // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa /
analyzed: // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa /
translated: The non-cessation of the cognition of the object is due to the fact that even when all the causes are assembled, the ascertainment ‚Äúthis is the cognition‚Äù is based on the cognition itself.

original: bam po sum cu rtsa gcig pa /
analyzed: bam po sum cu rtsa gcig pa /
translated: This is the summary of the chapter.

original: 'o na nges par sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de gang las yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na nges par sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de gang las yin zhe na /
translated: Now, if one asks, ‚ÄúWhat is the ascertainment that establishes the object?‚Äù

original: don dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: don dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response is ‚ÄúThe object, etc.‚Äù

original: dbang po la sogs pa ni mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i rang gi gnas tha dad pa las rnam par shes pa mi gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi rgyur gyur pa de tha dad pa byed pa yin na yang des byas pa'i shes pa tha dad pa ni
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa ni mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i rang gi gnas tha dad pa las rnam par shes pa mi gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi rgyur gyur pa de tha dad pa byed pa yin na yang des byas pa'i shes pa tha dad pa ni
translated: The sense faculties, etc., are the causes of the cognition that has the nature of non-clarity, etc., due to their own distinct states of non-clarity, etc. Even though they are distinct, the distinct cognition produced by them

original: don thams cad kyi thun mong nying yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: don thams cad kyi thun mong nying yin pa'i phyir /
translated: is common to all objects.

original: tha dad des myong ba'i don dang lhan cig don 'di myong ba ni 'di yin no zhes sbyor bar nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad des myong ba'i don dang lhan cig don 'di myong ba ni 'di yin no zhes sbyor bar nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not possible to connect the experience of this object with the distinct experience of the object experienced by that.

original: don gyi ngo bo ni don de'i rang gi bdag nyid don nyid la nges pa yin pa de ltar na nus pa yin no //
analyzed: don gyi ngo bo ni don de'i rang gi bdag nyid don nyid la nges pa yin pa de ltar na nus pa yin no //
translated: The nature of the object is the very self of the object, and it is ascertained in the object itself. In this way, it is a potentiality.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: don gyi ngo bo ma gtogs par //
analyzed: don gyi ngo bo ma gtogs par //
translated: Apart from the nature of the object,

original: gzhan dag dbang po la sogs pa mi gsal ba la sogs pa tha dad pa la /
analyzed: gzhan dag dbang po la sogs pa mi gsal ba la sogs pa tha dad pa la /
translated: other things, such as the sense faculty, are not clear, etc., and are different.

original: shes pa tha dad byed yin na'ang /
analyzed: shes pa tha dad byed yin na'ang /
translated: Even if they produce different consciousnesses,

original: myong ba de dag don dang bcas pa don 'di'i nyams su myong ba ni 'di yin no zhes ji ltar yang /
analyzed: myong ba de dag don dang bcas pa don 'di'i nyams su myong ba ni 'di yin no zhes ji ltar yang /
translated: those experiences are not the same as the object. How could they be?

original: tha dad pa dag ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa dag ni ma yin no //
translated: They are not different.

original: don gyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni //
analyzed: don gyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni //
translated: By the very nature of the object,

original: 'thad ba dag ni yin na ste //
analyzed: 'thad ba dag ni yin na ste //
translated: they are tenable.

original: de nyid ni sngon po'am ser po'i rtog pa 'di yin no zhes rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni sngon po'am ser po'i rtog pa 'di yin no zhes rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That very [nature] is the cause for positing this as the conception of blue or yellow.

original: gang gi phyir 'di ltar gzhal bya nyid ma gtogs par byed pa gzhan ma grub pa de'i phyir gzhal bya rtogs pa'i 'bras bur gyur pa'i gzhal bya'i ngo bo nyid sgrub par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di ltar gzhal bya nyid ma gtogs par byed pa gzhan ma grub pa de'i phyir gzhal bya rtogs pa'i 'bras bur gyur pa'i gzhal bya'i ngo bo nyid sgrub par byed pa yin no //
translated: Because, apart from being an object of knowledge, no other cause is established, therefore, the object of knowledge is established as the nature of the effect of the realization of the object of knowledge.

original: gzhal bya'i ngo bo nyid las sgrub par byed pa gzhan yin na /
analyzed: gzhal bya'i ngo bo nyid las sgrub par byed pa gzhan yin na /
translated: If the cause were different from the nature of the object of knowledge,

original: rtogs par byed na /
analyzed: rtogs par byed na /
translated: then, when it is realized,

original: nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi bya ba de las dang sngon po la sogs pa dang lhan cig sngon po 'di'i rtog pa 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa mi 'grub po //üîΩsgrub par @217a * //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi bya ba de las dang sngon po la sogs pa dang lhan cig sngon po 'di'i rtog pa 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa mi 'grub po // sgrub par @217a * //
translated: the activity characterized by experience would not be established as related to that object, such as blue, and the cognition of this blue.

original: byed par gyur pa gzhal bya'i ngo bo nyid de yang shes pa de'i bdag nyid yin no //
analyzed: byed par gyur pa gzhal bya'i ngo bo nyid de yang shes pa de'i bdag nyid yin no //
translated: The cause that is the nature of the object of knowledge is also the nature of that cognition.

original: gang gi phyir rgyu des na tshad ma las 'bras bu don gzhan min no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rgyu des na tshad ma las 'bras bu don gzhan min no //
translated: For that reason, the effect is not a different object from the valid cognition.

original: de ltar shes ba tha dad pa med pa'i bdag nyid yin zhing byed pa med pa yin na yang bya ba byed pa tha snyad nye bar btags pa'i sgo nas rig pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar shes ba tha dad pa med pa'i bdag nyid yin zhing byed pa med pa yin na yang bya ba byed pa tha snyad nye bar btags pa'i sgo nas rig pa ni /
translated: Thus, although the consciousnesses are of the nature of non-difference and are without activity, they are said to be the knower, in the sense of a conventional designation of activity.

original: don rtogs pa yi bdag nyid kyis //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa ston par byed do //
analyzed: don rtogs pa yi bdag nyid kyis // zhes bya ba la sogs pa ston par byed do //
translated: The nature of the realization of the objectüîΩis the nature of the result of activity.

original: don rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyis byed pa'i 'bras bur gyur pa don rtogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis shes pa'i bdag nyid de ni /
analyzed: don rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyis byed pa'i 'bras bur gyur pa don rtogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis shes pa'i bdag nyid de ni /
translated: The nature of consciousness, which is the nature of the realization of the object, is the nature of the result of activity.

original: gzhal bya'i ngo bo nyid de la 'dzin pa'i khyad par gyi byed pas byed dang bcas pa bzhin du snang gi byed pa bcas pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhal bya'i ngo bo nyid de la 'dzin pa'i khyad par gyi byed pas byed dang bcas pa bzhin du snang gi byed pa bcas pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: It appears as if it has activity, because of the special grasping to the nature of the object of comprehension. But it is not really active,

original: chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because all things are without activity.

original: khyad par du lus can ma yin pa ni bya ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: khyad par du lus can ma yin pa ni bya ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: In particular, that which is not corporeal is not really active.

original: gang la byed dang bcas pa bzhin du snang zhe na /
analyzed: gang la byed dang bcas pa bzhin du snang zhe na /
translated: In what way does it appear as if it has activity?

original: rang gi las ni zhes bya ba smos te gzugs la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: rang gi las ni zhes bya ba smos te gzugs la sogs pa la'o //
translated: It is said that it is one‚Äôs own object, such as form.

original: bdag nyid byed po min na yang /
analyzed: bdag nyid byed po min na yang /
translated: Although the self is not the agent,

original: de'i dbang gis gzhal bya dang 'dra ba'i dbang gis der gzhag phyir /
analyzed: de'i dbang gis gzhal bya dang 'dra ba'i dbang gis der gzhag phyir /
translated: it is posited as the experiencer because it is posited as similar to the object of experience.

original: rtog pa rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir gzhal bya dang 'dra ba de ni rtog pa rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu yin pa de ltar na sgrub par byed par brjod kyi don dam par ma yin no //
analyzed: rtog pa rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir gzhal bya dang 'dra ba de ni rtog pa rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu yin pa de ltar na sgrub par byed par brjod kyi don dam par ma yin no //
translated: Since it is posited as a thought, that similarity to the object of experience is the cause of the positing of thought. Thus it is called a proof, but not ultimately.üîΩFor example, an effect

original: dper na 'bras bu rgyu rnams kyi //
analyzed: dper na 'bras bu rgyu rnams kyi //
translated: is said to resemble its cause

original: bdag nyid 'dra bar 'byung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: bdag nyid 'dra bar 'byung ba'i phyir //
translated: because it arises with a nature similar to the cause.

original: rgyu'i phyir bya ba ldan nyid ma yin na yang /
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir bya ba ldan nyid ma yin na yang /
translated: Although the effect does not possess activity because it is not the cause,

original: bya ba med pa nyid yin na yang /
analyzed: bya ba med pa nyid yin na yang /
translated: and although it does not have activity,

original: 'jig rten rgyu gzugs 'dzin zhes brjod / dper na pha las de dang gzugs can gyi 'bras bu skyes pa la 'di pha'i gzugs 'dzin to zhes tha snyed du byed pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten rgyu gzugs 'dzin zhes brjod / dper na pha las de dang gzugs can gyi 'bras bu skyes pa la 'di pha'i gzugs 'dzin to zhes tha snyed du byed pa lta bu'o //
translated: the world says it holds the form of the cause. For example, when an effect arises from a father that has that form, it is said conventionally that it holds the form of the father.

original: de ltar 'dir yang yul rgyur gyur pa gang gi rnam pa'i rjes su byed cing skyes pa'i rnam pa shes pa la 'di'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'dir yang yul rgyur gyur pa gang gi rnam pa'i rjes su byed cing skyes pa'i rnam pa shes pa la 'di'o //
translated: Similarly, here also, consciousness that arises in the aspect of the object that is the cause is said to be that object.

original: de 'dzin pa yin no zhes shes pa de ltar na rtog par byed pa dang bcas pa la brten nas tshad ma nyid du nye bar btags pa yin no //
analyzed: de 'dzin pa yin no zhes shes pa de ltar na rtog par byed pa dang bcas pa la brten nas tshad ma nyid du nye bar btags pa yin no //
translated: If one thinks, It apprehends that, then on the basis of that which has conceptualization, one imputes it as valid knowledge.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar na gzhal bya'i ngo bo nyid bor nas /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar na gzhal bya'i ngo bo nyid bor nas /
translated: Because in that case, having abandoned the nature of the object of comprehension,

original: gzhan gyis las so so la shes pa rnam par 'byed par mi nus so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis las so so la shes pa rnam par 'byed par mi nus so //
translated: one is unable to distinguish the cognition in each individual action.üîΩTherefore, seeing and so on,

original: de'i phyir mthong dang / de'i phyir don tsam mthong dang / dbang 'brel dang dbang po phrad pa dang / khyad par gyi blo la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir mthong dang / de'i phyir don tsam mthong dang / dbang 'brel dang dbang po phrad pa dang / khyad par gyi blo la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, seeing mere objects, contact with the sense faculty, and the cognition of distinctions are called that.

original: mthong ba dang dbang po dang 'brel pa dang @217b khyad par byed pa can gyi blo dag ni /
analyzed: mthong ba dang dbang po dang 'brel pa dang @217b khyad par byed pa can gyi blo dag ni /
translated: Cognitions that see, are in contact with the sense faculty, and make distinctions,

original: tshad ma nyid du mi 'dod do //
analyzed: tshad ma nyid du mi 'dod do //
translated: are not accepted as valid knowledge.

original: mthong ba dang dbang po dang 'brel pa dang khyad par can gyi blo de dag byed pa rnams /
analyzed: mthong ba dang dbang po dang 'brel pa dang khyad par can gyi blo de dag byed pa rnams /
translated: Those cognitions that see, are in contact with the sense faculty, and make distinctions,

original: bya ba la ni chod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bya ba la ni chod pa'i phyir /
translated: are obstructed with regard to their function.

original: rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of being a cause.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In that case,

original: bya ba las dang byed pa rnams //
analyzed: bya ba las dang byed pa rnams //
translated: actions, agents, and instruments,

original: thams cad nye bar sbyor na yang //üîΩthams cad byed pa gzhan gyis mchod par bya ba gang de rang tha dad pa'i sgo nas /
analyzed: thams cad nye bar sbyor na yang // thams cad byed pa gzhan gyis mchod par bya ba gang de rang tha dad pa'i sgo nas /
translated: Even when all are applied,üîΩall are worshipped by another agent.

original: tha dad byed /
analyzed: tha dad byed /
translated: That is different by way of self-difference.

original: de ni sgrub byed dam par 'dod sgrub par byed pa dam pa ste byed pa'o //
analyzed: de ni sgrub byed dam par 'dod sgrub par byed pa dam pa ste byed pa'o //
translated: That is asserted as the best proof.

original: re zhig sgrub par byed pa dam pa /
analyzed: re zhig sgrub par byed pa dam pa /
translated: The best proof is

original: 'di 'dra dbang po la yang de /
analyzed: 'di 'dra dbang po la yang de /
translated: like that even for the sense faculties.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: kun gyi mtshungs rgyu nyid phyir ro //
analyzed: kun gyi mtshungs rgyu nyid phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the common cause of all.

original: rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the cause of all consciousnesses.

original: bya ba du ma'i khyad par bskyed du zin kyang ngo bo mtshungs pa gang yin pa de ni de'i nye bar ma chod pa tha dad par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bya ba du ma'i khyad par bskyed du zin kyang ngo bo mtshungs pa gang yin pa de ni de'i nye bar ma chod pa tha dad par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Even when producing the distinctions of many actions, that which is similar in nature is not differentiated by that interruption.

original: de tha dad kyang /
analyzed: de tha dad kyang /
translated: Even though that is different,

original: dbang po mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis tha dad na yang shes pa de dngos can min pa yul dang 'dra ba dang bral ba'i shes pa don 'di shes pa don 'di shes pa 'di'i yang zhes nges pas tha snyad du byed pa gang yin
analyzed: dbang po mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis tha dad na yang shes pa de dngos can min pa yul dang 'dra ba dang bral ba'i shes pa don 'di shes pa don 'di shes pa 'di'i yang zhes nges pas tha snyad du byed pa gang yin
translated: If there were a difference due to the particularities of unclear faculties and so on, then the cognition would not be the same entity as the object, and the cognition would be free from being similar to the object.

original: pa de gang las ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: pa de gang las ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: But since it is ascertained that this cognition of this object is of this object, how could it be that it is not the same?

original: dbang po'i tshad ma nyid ma yin par bstan pa de'i ni lhag ma don mthong ba la sogs pa bshad pa yin //
analyzed: dbang po'i tshad ma nyid ma yin par bstan pa de'i ni lhag ma don mthong ba la sogs pa bshad pa yin //
translated: The remainder of the explanation of seeing objects and so on is taught in order to show that the faculties are not valid cognitions.

original: dper na chod pa'i phyir byed pa'i phul du byung ba ma grub pas tshad ma nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na chod pa'i phyir byed pa'i phul du byung ba ma grub pas tshad ma nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like saying, ‚ÄúIt is not a valid cognition because it is not established as a supreme producer due to being obstructed.‚Äù

original: de ltar na 'dra ba med na mthong ba tsam yang tha dad par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na 'dra ba med na mthong ba tsam yang tha dad par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus, if there is no similarity, mere seeing is not what makes them different.

original: don mthong ba nyid ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don mthong ba nyid ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because seeing the object itself is not established.

original: don 'dra ba sgrub par byed pa nyid mi 'dod na /
analyzed: don 'dra ba sgrub par byed pa nyid mi 'dod na /
translated: If you do not accept that similarity establishes the object,üîΩthen

original: don 'di mthong ba 'di yin no zhes bya ba de yang grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don 'di mthong ba 'di yin no zhes bya ba de yang grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And it would not be established that ‚Äúthis is the seeing of that object.‚Äù

original: de ma grub na ji ltar na grub par byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: de ma grub na ji ltar na grub par byed par 'gyur /
translated: If that is not established, how could it be established?

original: khyad par can gyi blo yang ni /
analyzed: khyad par can gyi blo yang ni /
translated: The cognition of a specific object

original: 'di yang skyon lhag ma gzhan yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang skyon lhag ma gzhan yin te /
translated: This is another fault.

original: gang de dngos med na /
analyzed: gang de dngos med na /
translated: If it does not exist,

original: don dang 'dra ba med na nges par byed pa'i khyad par gyis shes pa 'di dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i shes pa 'di yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnyis kyis tha dad med /
analyzed: don dang 'dra ba med na nges par byed pa'i khyad par gyis shes pa 'di dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i shes pa 'di yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnyis kyis tha dad med /
translated: then if there is no similarity to the object, then the cognition that ascertains it and the cognition of the basis of the distinction would be indistinguishable.

original: bye brag yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bye brag yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There would be no difference.

original: khyad par ma grub na yang khyad par gyi shes pa 'di ni tshad ma yin zhing de las gzhan pa de 'bra sa bu yin no zhes bya ba de gang las yin /
analyzed: khyad par ma grub na yang khyad par gyi shes pa 'di ni tshad ma yin zhing de las gzhan pa de 'bra sa bu yin no zhes bya ba de gang las yin /
translated: If the distinction is not established, then how could it be that the cognition of the distinction is valid knowledge and the other is not?

original: ci ste khyad bar gyi shes pa'i 'dra ba tha dad par 'dod pa de'i @218a * //
analyzed: ci ste khyad bar gyi shes pa'i 'dra ba tha dad par 'dod pa de'i @218a * //
translated: But if you assert that the similarity of the cognition of the distinction is different,

original: tshe de nyid sgrub par byed par 'gyur zhing don rtogs par yang 'bras bur 'gyur te /
analyzed: tshe de nyid sgrub par byed par 'gyur zhing don rtogs par yang 'bras bur 'gyur te /
translated: then that itself would be the proof, and the realization of the object would be the result.

original: 'di ni de tsam gyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni de tsam gyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is just the nature of it.

original: de bzhin blo gzhan dag la yang /
analyzed: de bzhin blo gzhan dag la yang /
translated: And so it is with the other cognitions.

original: khyad par gyi shes pa bzhin du khyad par gyi gzhi'i shes pa la yang 'dra ba nyid las nges par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyad par gyi shes pa bzhin du khyad par gyi gzhi'i shes pa la yang 'dra ba nyid las nges par 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as there is a cognition of the qualifier, so too there is a cognition of the qualified.

original: de yang khyad par gzhi de la tshad ma dang tshad ma'i 'bras bur 'gyur ba de ltar na de dag gi nang nas gcig ni tshad ma yin la gzhan ni 'bras bu yin no zhes rtog pa don med pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang khyad par gzhi de la tshad ma dang tshad ma'i 'bras bur 'gyur ba de ltar na de dag gi nang nas gcig ni tshad ma yin la gzhan ni 'bras bu yin no zhes rtog pa don med pa yin no //
translated: And that is a valid cognition and the result of a valid cognition in regard to that qualified object. Thus, it is pointless to speculate that one of them is a valid cognition and the other is its result.

original: 'dis kyang khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i shes pa nyid ni tshad ma dang 'bras bu 'dod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis kyang khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i shes pa nyid ni tshad ma dang 'bras bu 'dod par mi bya'o //
translated: This also shows that the cognition of the qualified and the cognition of the qualifier should not be accepted as a valid cognition and its result.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar bya ba dang sgrub byed gnyis yul tha dad pa'ang mi 'dod do //
analyzed: 'di ltar bya ba dang sgrub byed gnyis yul tha dad pa'ang mi 'dod do //
translated: Because we do not accept that the object of the action and the instrument of the action are different.

original: sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de kho na bya bar 'gyur gyi byed pa gzhan la nye ba ma yin zhing gzhan la bya ba ma yin te shes pa gnyis po de dag tha dad pa'i yul can du 'dod pa rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de kho na bya bar 'gyur gyi byed pa gzhan la nye ba ma yin zhing gzhan la bya ba ma yin te shes pa gnyis po de dag tha dad pa'i yul can du 'dod pa rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: That which is the agent is only the action; it is not related to another action, nor does it have another action. It is not logical to assert that those two consciousnesses have different objects.

original: ci ste skyon der ma gyur cig snyam par dus snga phyir 'byung ba'i ngang tshul can gyi shes pa yul gcig pa can tshad ma dang tshad ma'i 'bras bur gyur par rtog pa de'i tshe /üîΩ'di ltar don gcig yin na'ang gnyis don med dus sngar 'byung ba can byed pa nyid du rtog na rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir de nyid tshad ma dang 'bras bu nyid yin pa de ltar na bya ba rdzogs pa'i don la 'jug pa 'bras bu
analyzed: ci ste skyon der ma gyur cig snyam par dus snga phyir 'byung ba'i ngang tshul can gyi shes pa yul gcig pa can tshad ma dang tshad ma'i 'bras bur gyur par rtog pa de'i tshe / 'di ltar don gcig yin na'ang gnyis don med dus sngar 'byung ba can byed pa nyid du rtog na rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir de nyid tshad ma dang 'bras bu nyid yin pa de ltar na bya ba rdzogs pa'i don la 'jug pa 'bras bu
translated: If you think, ‚ÄúLet us avoid that error,‚Äù and you imagine that a consciousness that occurs earlier and later has a single object, and that it is a valid cognition and the result of valid cognition,

original: nyid du brtag pa gnyis pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: nyid du brtag pa gnyis pas ci zhig bya /
translated: in that case, even though the object is one, if you imagine that the earlier one is the agent because it occurs earlier, then because it has the nature of being understood, it is itself a valid cognition and the result of valid cognition. In that case, what is the point of postulating a second action that engages the object that is the result of the valid cognition?

original: gzhan yang don de nus pa yin na ji ltar rnam par shes pa gcig skyed par byed pa de ltar de'i rgyu can gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang cig car skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan yang don de nus pa yin na ji ltar rnam par shes pa gcig skyed par byed pa de ltar de'i rgyu can gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang cig car skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, if the object is the potentiality, then just as it produces one consciousness, it would also produce other consciousnesses simultaneously,

original: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no difference.

original: de'i phyir shes pa de dag rim bzhin 'byung ba yod ma yin /üîΩci ste nyes pa der ma gyur cig snyam pas de dag cig car /
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa de dag rim bzhin 'byung ba yod ma yin / ci ste nyes pa der ma gyur cig snyam pas de dag cig car /
translated: Therefore, those consciousnesses do not occur in sequence.üîΩIf you assert that they are produced simultaneously,üîΩin order to avoid that error,

original: pa skyed par 'dod pa de yi tshe //
analyzed: pa skyed par 'dod pa de yi tshe //
translated: then at that time,

original: blo ni cig car 'byung gyur na //
analyzed: blo ni cig car 'byung gyur na //
translated: if the mind were to occur simultaneously,

original: blo ni zhes bya ba ni rigs la ltos nas tshigs gcig par byas pa yin no //
analyzed: blo ni zhes bya ba ni rigs la ltos nas tshigs gcig par byas pa yin no //
translated: the mind is stated in the singular because it is considered to be of the same type.

original: blo gnyis cig car te lhan cig 'byung zhing skye na de dag gis bsgrub bya sgrub byed med par 'gyur /
analyzed: blo gnyis cig car te lhan cig 'byung zhing skye na de dag gis bsgrub bya sgrub byed med par 'gyur /
translated: If two minds were to occur simultaneously and arise together, then there would be no object to be established and no means of establishing it.

original: tshad ma las 'bras bu don gzhan yin par smra ba'i rgyu ni sgrub par byed pa yin zhing 'bras bu ni bya ba yin par 'dod do //
analyzed: tshad ma las 'bras bu don gzhan yin par smra ba'i rgyu ni sgrub par byed pa yin zhing 'bras bu ni bya ba yin par 'dod do //
translated: Those who assert that the result is a different object from the means of valid knowledge maintain that the cause is the means of establishing and the result is the action.

original: dus mtshungs pa can gyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni yod pa ma yin no zhes sngar bstan zin to //
analyzed: dus mtshungs pa can gyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni yod pa ma yin no zhes sngar bstan zin to //
translated: We have already explained that things that are simultaneous causes and effects do not exist.

original: gal @218b te dus mtshungs par 'byung ba nyid kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid ma yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe tha dad pa med pa'i bdag nyid can gyi shes pa gcig la chesüîΩshin tu yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal @218b te dus mtshungs par 'byung ba nyid kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid ma yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po yod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe tha dad pa med pa'i bdag nyid can gyi shes pa gcig la ches shin tu yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that because things that arise simultaneously are not causes and effects, the relationship of probandum and probans does not exist, then at that time, a single consciousness that does not have a different nature does not exist at all.

original: de la skyon de yod pa ma yin te 'di ltar shes pa la'o //
analyzed: de la skyon de yod pa ma yin te 'di ltar shes pa la'o //
translated: If you say that, then that error does not exist, because it is like this:

original: de rnam gzhag la brten nas ni //
analyzed: de rnam gzhag la brten nas ni //
translated: In dependence on the presentation of consciousness,üîΩThe presentation of the probandum and the probans of consciousness is established.

original: shes pa'i chad dag bsgrub bya sgrub byed gzhag / yul rtogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ni don dang 'dra ba la brten pa yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: shes pa'i chad dag bsgrub bya sgrub byed gzhag / yul rtogs pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ni don dang 'dra ba la brten pa yin pa de ltar na /
translated: The presentation of the object-realizer is based on the likeness of the object.

original: byed pa ma yin na yang byed pa bzhin du nye bar btags pa yin te /
analyzed: byed pa ma yin na yang byed pa bzhin du nye bar btags pa yin te /
translated: Even though it is not a creator, it is imputed as if it were a creator.

original: phyi rol gyi bzhin du bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi bzhin du bskyed bya skyed byed kyi dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is not a thing that is produced or a producer, like an external object.

original: kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no //
translated: It is not a source of error.

original: phrad pa yang tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: phrad pa yang tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: Contact is not a source of valid knowledge.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: 'di ltar phrad pa ni rnam pa 'ga' zhig la 'jug pa ma yin na /
analyzed: 'di ltar phrad pa ni rnam pa 'ga' zhig la 'jug pa ma yin na /
translated: Because contact does not occur in any way.

original: gang gi na don gyis rnam pa 'ga' zhig rtogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gi na don gyis rnam pa 'ga' zhig rtogs par 'gyur /
translated: How could it be that one understands something by means of it?

original: gang gi phyir bdag nyid thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bdag nyid thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because one understands everything by oneself.

original: de ltar na bdag nyid kyi 'brel na yang dngos po chos 'ga' zhig ni rtogs 'gyur ba'i /
analyzed: de ltar na bdag nyid kyi 'brel na yang dngos po chos 'ga' zhig ni rtogs 'gyur ba'i /
translated: Thus, even if there were contact with the object, some property of the thing that is understood

original: phrad pa tshad ma nyid yin na gang nges par der ni mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: phrad pa tshad ma nyid yin na gang nges par der ni mi 'gyur te /
translated: would not be a source of valid knowledge.

original: gang rnam pa 'ga' zhig 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: gang rnam pa 'ga' zhig 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: That which is ascertained in some way is characterized by the apprehension of some aspect.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩ'brel pa bye brag med phyir ro //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / 'brel pa bye brag med phyir ro //
translated: Why?üîΩBecause there is no difference in the relation.

original: phrad par bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phrad par bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no difference in contact.

original: gang gi tshe phrad pa'i khyad par med na yang /
analyzed: gang gi tshe phrad pa'i khyad par med na yang /
translated: Even if there is no difference in contact,

original: don rtogs pa'i khyad par du 'gyur te /
analyzed: don rtogs pa'i khyad par du 'gyur te /
translated: The difference is in the understanding of the object.

original: don 'ga' zhig rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don 'ga' zhig rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the understanding of some object.

original: de'i tshe phrad pa tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe phrad pa tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: At that time, contact is not a valid cognition.

original: 'o na tshad ma nyid ci zhig yin zhe na /üîΩde tha dad med kyang phrad par bye brag med na yang gang las nges pa ma chod pa las gang sngon po shes pa ni 'di yin la /
analyzed: 'o na tshad ma nyid ci zhig yin zhe na / de tha dad med kyang phrad par bye brag med na yang gang las nges pa ma chod pa las gang sngon po shes pa ni 'di yin la /
translated: Well then, what is a valid cognition?

original: ser po shes pa ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i shes pa'o //
analyzed: ser po shes pa ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i shes pa'o //
translated: Even though it is not different, if there is no distinction in contact, from what is the determination made? From the cognition of blue, this is the cognition of blue, and from the cognition of yellow, this is the cognition of yellow.

original: tha dad 'di de'i tshad ma nyid /
analyzed: tha dad 'di de'i tshad ma nyid /
translated: This difference is its validity.

original: de yang don dang 'dra ba las /
analyzed: de yang don dang 'dra ba las /
translated: And that is not different from the object.

original: gzhan ma yin no zhes mang du bshad zin to //
analyzed: gzhan ma yin no zhes mang du bshad zin to //
translated: This has been explained many times.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This may be so,

original: gal te 'dus byas yin phyir na //
analyzed: gal te 'dus byas yin phyir na //
translated: but if it is produced,

original: shes pa las skyes pa shes pa'i rgyu 'dus byas pa las don so so la shes pa res 'ga' ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: shes pa las skyes pa shes pa'i rgyu 'dus byas pa las don so so la shes pa res 'ga' ba yin no zhe na /
translated: then the cognition produced from the cause of cognition, the produced object, is sometimes the cognition of each object.

original: de dang de min te /
analyzed: de dang de min te /
translated: That is not so.

original: 'di ltar / de dngos min te gzhag med phyir //
analyzed: 'di ltar / de dngos min te gzhag med phyir //
translated: Because it is not a real entity, it cannot be posited.

original: gal te yul 'di'i rnam pa la //
analyzed: gal te yul 'di'i rnam pa la //
translated: If it is the aspect of this object,

original: shes pa 'di rjes su byed pa skyes ba de'i tshe yul gang gi rnam pa la rjes su byed pa'i shes pa de ni 'dra ba de las 'di'i 'di yin @219a * //üîΩno zhes nges pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes pa 'di rjes su byed pa skyes ba de'i tshe yul gang gi rnam pa la rjes su byed pa'i shes pa de ni 'dra ba de las 'di'i 'di yin @219a * // no zhes nges pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: From what object that is similar to that consciousness would it arise?üîΩIf it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.üîΩIf it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.

original: de bas na de 'dra ba'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa skye bas 'dus byas pa nges par byed pa de 'dra ba skyed par byed na /
analyzed: de bas na de 'dra ba'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa skye bas 'dus byas pa nges par byed pa de 'dra ba skyed par byed na /
translated: If it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.

original: 'dus byas pa gang las de 'dra ba'i shes pa nges par 'byung bar 'gyur /üîΩ'di ltar don dang 'dra ba med na shes pa des pa med pa'i phyir de skyed par byed pa'i 'dus byas pa yang ma nges pa yin pa de ltar na gang gis na 'di las don so sor shes pa tha dad pa yin /
analyzed: 'dus byas pa gang las de 'dra ba'i shes pa nges par 'byung bar 'gyur / 'di ltar don dang 'dra ba med na shes pa des pa med pa'i phyir de skyed par byed pa'i 'dus byas pa yang ma nges pa yin pa de ltar na gang gis na 'di las don so sor shes pa tha dad pa yin /
translated: If it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.üîΩIf it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.üîΩIf it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.üîΩIf it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: If it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.üîΩIf it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.üîΩIf it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.üîΩIf it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.üîΩIf it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.

original: gal te bya byed gcig yin na //üîΩ'gal lo zhe na /
analyzed: gal te bya byed gcig yin na // 'gal lo zhe na /
translated: If it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.

original: dngos su tha dad pa med pa'i phyir shes pa'i cha gcig nyid na ste /
analyzed: dngos su tha dad pa med pa'i phyir shes pa'i cha gcig nyid na ste /
translated: If it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.üîΩIf it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.üîΩIf it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.üîΩIf it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.üîΩIf it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.üîΩIf it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.üîΩIf it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.üîΩIf it were not similar to the object, it would not arise from that object.

original: bya ba gang yin pa de nyid byed pa yin pa'i phyir de ni 'gal ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bya ba gang yin pa de nyid byed pa yin pa'i phyir de ni 'gal ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Because it is the very thing that is the action that is the agent, this is a contradiction.

original: de dang de ni mi bden te /
analyzed: de dang de ni mi bden te /
translated: That is not correct.

original: chos tha dad pa khas len pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i lnga pas ni shes pa ston par byed do //
analyzed: chos tha dad pa khas len pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i lnga pas ni shes pa ston par byed do //
translated: The fifth line, ‚Äúbecause of the acceptance of different properties,‚Äù shows that consciousness is not one.

original: gal te chos tha dad par khas len pa yod na shes pa'i dngos po tha dad pa med par kho bo cag 'dod de /
analyzed: gal te chos tha dad par khas len pa yod na shes pa'i dngos po tha dad pa med par kho bo cag 'dod de /
translated: If there is the acceptance of different properties, we assert that the entity of consciousness is not different.

original: dngos su shes pa de gcig yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dngos su shes pa de gcig yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúthat consciousness is one‚Äù is that it is directly one.

original: 'dir yang gzhal bya'i ngo bo nyid dang don rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i chos tha dad pa gang yin pa de khas len pa nyid ni ldog pa'i tha dad pas nye bar btags pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir yang gzhal bya'i ngo bo nyid dang don rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i chos tha dad pa gang yin pa de khas len pa nyid ni ldog pa'i tha dad pas nye bar btags pa yin no //
translated: Here, too, the acceptance of whatever is the different property called ‚Äúthe nature of the object of comprehension‚Äù and ‚Äúthe realization of the object‚Äù is a designation by way of a difference in negation.

original: chos tha dad pa khas len pa'i phyir bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa gcig nyid yin no zhes bya ba la skyon yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos tha dad pa khas len pa'i phyir bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa gcig nyid yin no zhes bya ba la skyon yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because of the acceptance of different properties, there is no fault in saying that action and agent are one.

original: gang du yang dngos po tha dad pa la bya ba dang byed pa rnam par 'jog par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: gang du yang dngos po tha dad pa la bya ba dang byed pa rnam par 'jog par 'dod pa ste /
translated: Wherever it is asserted that an action and an agent are established in different things,

original: dper na sta re la sogs pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: dper na sta re la sogs pa lta bu ste /
translated: for example, in an axe, etc.

original: dngos rnams tha dad 'dod pa la //
analyzed: dngos rnams tha dad 'dod pa la //
translated: In the assertion of the difference of things,

original: der yang dngos po la rten pa can ma yin no //
analyzed: der yang dngos po la rten pa can ma yin no //
translated: there is no dependence on a thing.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sgro 'dogs pas ni 'jug phyir ro //
analyzed: sgro 'dogs pas ni 'jug phyir ro //
translated: Because of the engagement of superimposition.

original: shes pa de dang de la brten pas bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa 'ba' zhig tu sgro 'dogs pa dang ldan pa dag bya ba dang byed pa zhes brjod kyi /
analyzed: shes pa de dang de la brten pas bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa 'ba' zhig tu sgro 'dogs pa dang ldan pa dag bya ba dang byed pa zhes brjod kyi /
translated: That which is produced and that which produces are merely imagined to be dependent on this or that cognition, and they are called action and agent.

original: don gzhan du gyur pa'i bya ba ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don gzhan du gyur pa'i bya ba ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But an action that is a different object does not exist.

original: de med pa'i phyir gang las byed pa yin /
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir gang las byed pa yin /
translated: Because that does not exist, what is an agent?üîΩTherefore,

original: de'i phyir / bya ba byed pa tha snyad dag / thams cad de lta'i rnam pa can //
analyzed: de'i phyir / bya ba byed pa tha snyad dag / thams cad de lta'i rnam pa can //
translated: all conventions of the performance of action are of that kind.

original: nye bar btags pa'i rang bzhin yin gyi dngos po la brten ba can ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nye bar btags pa'i rang bzhin yin gyi dngos po la brten ba can ni ma yin no //
translated: They have the nature of designation, but they are not dependent on things.

original: rnam par shes pa nyid yul du snang bar skye na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa tha dad pa dang ldan par nges pa yin gyi /üîΩphyir rol gyi don yod pa ma @219b yin pa de ltar na don rtogs pa'i ngo bo bya ba 'gal zhig kyang yod pa ma yin na /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid yul du snang bar skye na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa tha dad pa dang ldan par nges pa yin gyi / phyir rol gyi don yod pa ma @219b yin pa de ltar na don rtogs pa'i ngo bo bya ba 'gal zhig kyang yod pa ma yin na /
translated: If consciousness itself were to arise as the appearance of an object, then it would definitely possess the duality of object apprehended and subject apprehender.

original: gang tshad ma'i 'bras bu nyid du rnam par 'jog par 'gyur zhes dgongs nas /
analyzed: gang tshad ma'i 'bras bu nyid du rnam par 'jog par 'gyur zhes dgongs nas /
translated: But if external objects do not exist, then the nature of the realization of an object would be contradictory, and so it does not exist.

original: bstan bcos mdzad pas mdo sde pa la /
analyzed: bstan bcos mdzad pas mdo sde pa la /
translated: With this in mind, the treatise states:üîΩThe Sautrantikas are asked:

original: don rig gang yin zhes 'dri ba mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: don rig gang yin zhes 'dri ba mdzad pa yin no //
translated: What is the object of the object of knowledge?

original: don rig pa 'di'i don rig par bya ba nyid kyi phyir don rig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don rig pa 'di'i don rig par bya ba nyid kyi phyir don rig pa ma yin no //
translated: The object of this object of knowledge is not the object of knowledge itself.

original: so so rang rig gzhan gyis mngon sum gang yin 'di 'dod do zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: so so rang rig gzhan gyis mngon sum gang yin 'di 'dod do zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: We assert that it is the direct perception of each individual continuum.

original: rgyud so so'i mngon sum la de yod pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: rgyud so so'i mngon sum la de yod pa nyid yin na /
translated: If it exists in the direct perception of each individual continuum,

original: ci'i phyir de la yang snyon par byed ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de la yang snyon par byed ce na /
translated: why do you deny it?

original: rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin no zhes 'gog par mi byed do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin no zhes 'gog par mi byed do //
translated: We do not deny that it exists in every way.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: myong ba 'di ni yod mod kyi 'on kyang /üîΩdon rig de ni gang gis yin //
analyzed: myong ba 'di ni yod mod kyi 'on kyang / don rig de ni gang gis yin //
translated: This experience does exist, butüîΩwhat is the cause of the cognition of the object?

original: rgyu gang gis brjod ces 'dri bar mdzad do //
analyzed: rgyu gang gis brjod ces 'dri bar mdzad do //
translated: What is the cause of the expression?

original: 'di la 'dri ba ci zhig yod //
analyzed: 'di la 'dri ba ci zhig yod //
translated: What is the question here?

original: de 'dra ba las yin /üîΩskye ba dang don dang 'dra ba la don myong bar 'dod do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de 'dra ba las yin / skye ba dang don dang 'dra ba la don myong bar 'dod do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is that which is similar to that.üîΩThat which is similar to the arising and the object is asserted to be the experience of the object.

original: 'di ltar gang las shes pa skye ba dang 'dra bar gyur pa de ni de'i yul yin no zhes mtshan nyid bstan pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar gang las shes pa skye ba dang 'dra bar gyur pa de ni de'i yul yin no zhes mtshan nyid bstan pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The definition of an object of knowledge is this: that which is similar to the arising of a cognition is its object.

original: 'khrul par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'khrul par 'gyur /
translated: But that is mistaken.

original: 'khrul pa gang yin pa de ni de'i tshe mtshan nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: 'khrul pa gang yin pa de ni de'i tshe mtshan nyid ma yin te /
translated: That which is mistaken is not a definition at that time.

original: dper na nam mkha' lus can ma yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha' lus can ma yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, space is not a body.

original: de dang 'dra ba de las byung //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba de las byung //
translated: That which is similar to that arises from that.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'khrul par 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'khrul par 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This and more will be explained as mistaken.

original: gzhal bya nyams su myong ba ma gtogs pa myong ba yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: gzhal bya nyams su myong ba ma gtogs pa myong ba yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
translated: Since the experience of an object of knowledge is not possible without the experience of the object,

original: de med na nyams su myong ba yang med pa thob par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pas /
analyzed: de med na nyams su myong ba yang med pa thob par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pas /
translated: If that does not exist, then even experience will not exist.üîΩ

original: ci ste gang las 'di myong ste //
analyzed: ci ste gang las 'di myong ste //
translated: If it does not exist, then the experience of it would not exist either.

original: zhes bya ba 'dri bar byed do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dri bar byed do //
translated: So he asks, ‚ÄúWhat is the object of experience?‚Äù

original: so so rang gis rig ba'i nyams su myong ba shes pa 'di'i gzhal bya gang las 'gyur te /
analyzed: so so rang gis rig ba'i nyams su myong ba shes pa 'di'i gzhal bya gang las 'gyur te /
translated: What is the object of this experience that is known as self-awareness?

original: gzhal bya med pa nyid kyi phyir mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhal bya med pa nyid kyi phyir mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not an object, because it does not exist.

original: gang gi phyir nyams su myong ba 'di yang yod pa yin pa de'i phyir 'di nyams su myong par bya ba'i sgo nas 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nyams su myong ba 'di yang yod pa yin pa de'i phyir 'di nyams su myong par bya ba'i sgo nas 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Since this experience exists, it is an object of experience.

original: de nyid 'dir ni dpyad par bya /
analyzed: de nyid 'dir ni dpyad par bya /
translated: This is the meaning.üîΩWe also want to know what you consider to be the object of experience.

original: 'di nyams su myong ba yin no zhes 'dod pa gang yin pa 'di kho bo cag gis kyang khyed las shes par 'dod pas de nyid dpyad par bya ba yin pa de ltar na nga la don 'di 'dri bar ma byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di nyams su myong ba yin no zhes 'dod pa gang yin pa 'di kho bo cag gis kyang khyed las shes par 'dod pas de nyid dpyad par bya ba yin pa de ltar na nga la don 'di 'dri bar ma byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since this is what we want to know, do not ask me about this matter.

original: nyams su myong ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de yang gzhal bya las 'gyur @220a * //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de yang gzhal bya las 'gyur @220a * //
translated: And that which is the entity of experience is also a cognizable object.

original: ro zhes bshad pa 'di yang skyon yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ro zhes bshad pa 'di yang skyon yod pa ma yin te /
translated: This explanation is also free of fault,

original: don dam par tha snyad 'di med pa'i phyir dang / blo 'khrul pa la snang ba'i dbang gis rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam par tha snyad 'di med pa'i phyir dang / blo 'khrul pa la snang ba'i dbang gis rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because ultimately these conventions do not exist and because they are posited by the power of appearance to a deluded mind.

original: mtshan nyid ni yod pa can dang ldog pa med pa can du 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: mtshan nyid ni yod pa can dang ldog pa med pa can du 'gyur grang na /
translated: If you say that a characteristic would be existent and not nonexistent,

original: de la 'dir yod par khas len na yul gyi mtshan nyid 'khrul ba can du bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de la 'dir yod par khas len na yul gyi mtshan nyid 'khrul ba can du bshad pa yin no //
translated: then here, if you accept existence, you explain the characteristic of the object to be deluded.

original: dpyad pa na 'dra ba nyid kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir rdul phran zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dpyad pa na 'dra ba nyid kyang yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir rdul phran zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate that when analyzed, even similarity does not exist, he says ‚Äúatom‚Äù and so on.

original: rdul phra rab re re'i bdag nyid can gyi yul dag gi ngo bo'am tshogs pa'i ngo bo 'jog par 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: rdul phra rab re re'i bdag nyid can gyi yul dag gi ngo bo'am tshogs pa'i ngo bo 'jog par 'gyur grang na /
translated: If you posit the nature of individual objects that have the nature of a single atom or the nature of an aggregation,

original: de la re zhig rdul phra rab kyi bdag nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de la re zhig rdul phra rab kyi bdag nyid ma yin te /
translated: then first, it is not the nature of a single atom.

original: 'di ltar shes pa la rags pa'i rnam par snang ba de yang phra ba re re la yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas rdul phra rab 'dra bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar shes pa la rags pa'i rnam par snang ba de yang phra ba re re la yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas rdul phra rab 'dra bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the appearance of a gross form in consciousness does not exist in each subtle atom. In that case, it is not made similar to the subtle atom from the point of view of its own nature.

original: tshogs pa rnams las yang ngo bo gcig yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshogs pa rnams las yang ngo bo gcig yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Nor does a single entity exist in the collection,

original: gcig dang du ma 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because one and many are mutually exclusive.

original: rags par snang ba'i shes pa myong ba rdul phran de dag gang gis na /
analyzed: rags par snang ba'i shes pa myong ba rdul phran de dag gang gis na /
translated: By what means is the experience of the consciousness appearing as gross felt in those atoms?

original: rnam pa gang gis na de dag 'dra bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis na de dag 'dra bar 'gyur te /
translated: By what aspect do they become similar?

original: 'dri bar byed pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dri bar byed pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: They are not the agent of the inquiry itself,

original: du ma nyid kyi phyir dang rdul phra rab nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: du ma nyid kyi phyir dang rdul phra rab nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of their multiplicity and because of their subtlety.

original: 'dra bar byed pa nyid ma yin pa'i rgyu de ni de'i tshe don dngos min zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'dra bar byed pa nyid ma yin pa'i rgyu de ni de'i tshe don dngos min zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The reason why they are not the agent of similarity is stated: ‚ÄúAt that time, it is not the entity of the object, etc.‚Äù

original: de'i don dngos min shes pa don dang 'dra ba yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na mtshan nyid yod pa can ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i don dngos min shes pa don dang 'dra ba yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na mtshan nyid yod pa can ma yin no //
translated: The consciousness is not similar to the object, because it is not the entity of the object. In that case, it does not have the characteristic of existence.

original: yod na don dang 'dra bar yod na yang de 'khrul pa can du 'gyur ba'i phyir de myong ba'i ngo bo ni /
analyzed: yod na don dang 'dra bar yod na yang de 'khrul pa can du 'gyur ba'i phyir de myong ba'i ngo bo ni /
translated: The nature of the experience of that object is

original: yul nyams su myong ba nyid na'o //
analyzed: yul nyams su myong ba nyid na'o //
translated: the experience of the object itself.

original: sgrub par byed pa nus pa ma yin te /üîΩde ltar na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nus pa ma yin te / de ltar na /
translated: It is not a means of valid knowledge,üîΩbecause it is not a means of valid knowledge in that way.

original: de 'dra ba dang de las byung //
analyzed: de 'dra ba dang de las byung //
translated: It is similar to that and arises from that.

original: gal te myong ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te myong ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: If it has the characteristic of experience,

original: don mtshungs can gyis rnam par shes //
analyzed: don mtshungs can gyis rnam par shes //
translated: then consciousness is similar to its object.

original: mtshungs pa de ma thag myong 'gyur //üîΩnyams su myong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: mtshungs pa de ma thag myong 'gyur // nyams su myong bar 'gyur te /
translated: It is experienced immediately.

original: dran pa las 'byung bas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dran pa las 'byung bas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is experienced because it arises from memory.

original: nyams su myong ba'i shes pa de ni gtso bo'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i shes pa de ni gtso bo'i rgyu yin te /
translated: That consciousness of experience is the primary cause,

original: gtso bo'i rgyu gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtso bo'i rgyu gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no other primary cause.

original: de ma thag tu byung ba dran pa las byung ba de de las de'i rnam pa can yin zhing de las byung pa de ltar na de ni snga ma de yul du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ma thag tu byung ba dran pa las byung ba de de las de'i rnam pa can yin zhing de las byung pa de ltar na de ni snga ma de yul du 'gyur ro //
translated: That which arises immediately from memory is similar to that, and it arises from that. In that way, the former is its object.

original: gang gi phyir nyams su myong ba des yul mtshungs pa can nyid du 'dod pa de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir nyams su myong ba des yul mtshungs pa can nyid du 'dod pa de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because it is accepted that the experience has the same object,

original: don @220b mtshungs can gyi zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: don @220b mtshungs can gyi zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: therefore, it says ‚Äúhaving the same object as the object.‚Äù

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is the case, but

original: rnam pa thams cad kyi rjes su byed pa ma yin pa de ltar na de'i rjes su byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kyi rjes su byed pa ma yin pa de ltar na de'i rjes su byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: if it does not conform to all aspects, then it does not conform to that.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: gzhan la yang mtshungs pa can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan la yang mtshungs pa can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the same for the other.

original: nyams su myong ba'i shes pa yang rnam pa thams cad du don gyi rjes su byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i shes pa yang rnam pa thams cad du don gyi rjes su byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The consciousness of experience does not conform to the object in every way.

original: de lta ma yin na don thams cad kyi rjes su byed pas shes pa nyid don yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na don thams cad kyi rjes su byed pas shes pa nyid don yin pa de ltar na /
translated: If it were otherwise, then because it conforms to all objects, consciousness would be the object.

original: don zhes bya ba cung zad kyang med par 'gyur 'o //
analyzed: don zhes bya ba cung zad kyang med par 'gyur 'o //
translated: In that case, there would be no object at all called ‚Äúobject.‚Äù

original: der snang ba nyid ni dran pa las byung ba nyid la yang yod pa ma yin pas de ltar na mtshungs so //
analyzed: der snang ba nyid ni dran pa las byung ba nyid la yang yod pa ma yin pas de ltar na mtshungs so //
translated: The appearance as that does not exist even in what arises from memory. Thus, it is the same.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is the case, but

original: 'di mthong de thos zhes bya ba //
analyzed: 'di mthong de thos zhes bya ba //
translated: ‚ÄúI see this, I hear that‚Äù

original: gang la blo ni nges pa de //
analyzed: gang la blo ni nges pa de //
translated: when the mind is certain with regard to something,

original: des myong yin no //
analyzed: des myong yin no //
translated: it is experienced.

original: 'di mthong ba dang 'di thos pa'i sgra'i ngo bo zhes bya ba mthong ba dang / thos pa dag las dus phyis yul gang la nges par 'gyur ba de la mthong ba dang thos pa de dag nyams su myong ba yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di mthong ba dang 'di thos pa'i sgra'i ngo bo zhes bya ba mthong ba dang / thos pa dag las dus phyis yul gang la nges par 'gyur ba de la mthong ba dang thos pa de dag nyams su myong ba yin gyi /
translated: When the mind is certain with regard to the object ‚Äúsound of the words I see this, I hear that,‚Äù then the seeing and the hearing are experienced.

original: shes pa de ma thag pa la de lta bu yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shes pa de ma thag pa la de lta bu yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But this is not the case with regard to the cognition that is immediately past.

original: des na mtshan nyid la 'khrul pa med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na mtshan nyid la 'khrul pa med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Thus there is no error in the definition.

original: nye ba nyid de nyid dpyad par bya ba ste /
analyzed: nye ba nyid de nyid dpyad par bya ba ste /
translated: But proximity itself must be examined.

original: snang ba dang mthon ba dang dang thos pa dag gi don nye ba 'ba' zhig 'thad pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: snang ba dang mthon ba dang dang thos pa dag gi don nye ba 'ba' zhig 'thad pa de'i tshe /
translated: It is only when the object of seeing, hearing, etc. is present that it is tenable.

original: de la brten nas byung ba zhen pa de 'dra ba ni yul du rnam par gzhag pa'i rten du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la brten nas byung ba zhen pa de 'dra ba ni yul du rnam par gzhag pa'i rten du 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, on the basis of that, the cognition that arises is the basis for the determination of the object.

original: mthong ba dang thos pa de dag ni don dang nye ba de nyid dpyad par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: mthong ba dang thos pa de dag ni don dang nye ba de nyid dpyad par bya ba yin na /
translated: But the seeing and the hearing must be examined with regard to their proximity to the object.

original: de yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: That also does not exist.

original: gang gis don de mthong ba de 'dod de de ni mthong ba der rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis don de mthong ba de 'dod de de ni mthong ba der rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: That which sees that object is not tenable as the seer.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: snang dang mthong ba de dag ni //
analyzed: snang dang mthong ba de dag ni //
translated: The seeing and the seen

original: 'brel pa la ni brten nas ni //
analyzed: 'brel pa la ni brten nas ni //
translated: Are established in dependence on the relation.

original: lta ba po yi nges de yin //
analyzed: lta ba po yi nges de yin //
translated: That is the ascertainment of the seer.

original: mthong ba dang thos pa 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i nges pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba dang thos pa dag don dang 'brel pa grub pa na 'brel pa de la brten nas 'gyur na don yang ma grub pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa de ltar
analyzed: mthong ba dang thos pa 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i nges pa gang yin pa de ni mthong ba dang thos pa dag don dang 'brel pa grub pa na 'brel pa de la brten nas 'gyur na don yang ma grub pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa de ltar
translated: The ascertainment that this is seeing and this is hearing is established in dependence on the relation of the seen and the heard to the object. But the object is not established. Since it has the characteristic of nonestablishment,üîΩthen the characteristic of the subject, seeing or hearing, is not established.

original: na / de'i yul can gyi mtshan nyid mthong ba'am thos pa ma grub pa yin no zhes bya ba gang las dus phyis 'byung ba can gyi nges pa de de'i yul can gyi mtshan nyid la brten pa yin /
analyzed: na / de'i yul can gyi mtshan nyid mthong ba'am thos pa ma grub pa yin no zhes bya ba gang las dus phyis 'byung ba can gyi nges pa de de'i yul can gyi mtshan nyid la brten pa yin /
translated: How could the ascertainment that occurs later be based on the characteristic of the subject?

original: 'dis ni gcig la gcig brten pa yin pa bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni gcig la gcig brten pa yin pa bstan to //
translated: This shows that they are mutually dependent.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba gzhan 'ga' zhig myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa @221a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba gzhan 'ga' zhig myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa @221a * //
translated: Because it is not experienced as something else,

original: de ni phyi rol nyams su myong ba la ltos pa med par shes pa de ni nyams myong bdag nyid de /
analyzed: de ni phyi rol nyams su myong ba la ltos pa med par shes pa de ni nyams myong bdag nyid de /
translated: that cognition is of the nature of experience, without depending on the experience of something external.

original: de'i phyir de yang 'ba' zhig gi ma yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir de yang 'ba' zhig gi ma yin /
translated: Therefore, it is not of that alone.

original: don nyams su myong ba ma yin te /
analyzed: don nyams su myong ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not the experience of an object,

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid dang 'bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid dang 'bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is free from the characteristics of object and subject.

original: gal te 'di ltar 'di'i mngon sum gyis so sor myong ba nyid de ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar 'di'i mngon sum gyis so sor myong ba nyid de ji ltar zhe na /
translated: If it is the experience of that by direct perception, how is that?

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po nyid las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po nyid las ni ma yin no //
translated: Not from the nature of object and subject.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is it then?

original: mngon sum so sor myong nyid kyang //
analyzed: mngon sum so sor myong nyid kyang //
translated: The experience of direct perception

original: shes pa / de yi de ni bdag nyid yin //
analyzed: shes pa / de yi de ni bdag nyid yin //
translated: is the nature of that cognition.

original: nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid du skyes pa yin gyi gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid du skyes pa yin gyi gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo ni ma yin no //
translated: It is born as the nature of experience, not as the nature of object and subject.

original: gang gi phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin pa por mi rigs pa'i rgyu /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin pa por mi rigs pa'i rgyu /
translated: Because it is not tenable that there is an object of apprehension and an apprehender.

original: des na nyams myong bya gzhan med //
analyzed: des na nyams myong bya gzhan med //
translated: Therefore, there is no other experience.

original: shes pa'o // de yi myong ba gzhan med na //
analyzed: shes pa'o // de yi myong ba gzhan med na //
translated: It is consciousness. If there is no other experience of it,

original: gang gis na nyams su myong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis na nyams su myong bar 'gyur /
translated: by what is it experienced?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de yang brgal ba mtshungs phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang brgal ba mtshungs phyir ro //
translated: Because the objection is the same.

original: gal te gzung ba'i mtshan nyid la lar rigs par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te gzung ba'i mtshan nyid la lar rigs par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: If it were tenable that it has the character of an object of apprehension,

original: shes pa la yang der 'gyur na //
analyzed: shes pa la yang der 'gyur na //
translated: then it would be the same for consciousness.

original: 'di ltar de yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar de yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But that is not the case.

original: de med par ni yul bzhin du 'di la yang nyams su myong ba cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: de med par ni yul bzhin du 'di la yang nyams su myong ba cung zad kyang med do //
translated: Just as there is no object, there is not the slightest experience of it.

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because that is the case,

original: de bdag shes pa rang gsal 'gyur //
analyzed: de bdag shes pa rang gsal 'gyur //
translated: it is self-knowing consciousness.

original: nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo bdag nyid nyams su myong ba'i rang bzhin du skyes pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
